short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: #1 - Your Next Challenge - show information about the challenges you are participating in

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: #1 Your Next Challenge . This extension allows you to participate in challenges organized by coaches. It gives you up-to-date information about the practicalities of a challenge (what, when, where). You'll be able to discover un-announced bonusses ...
